ja352:7.3: tatheva tiṭṭhanti → so tāta tatheva tiṭṭhati (mr)
ja352:8.1: sīsañca → sīsaṃ vā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja352:10.1: Abbahī → abbūḷhaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | abbahi (pts-vp-pli1ed) | abbhūḷhaṃ (mr)
ja352:10.2: yamāsi hadayassitaṃ → sokaṃ hadayanissitaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | yamāsi hadayanissitaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
